title: The Dark Money Behind Biden's Justice Pick | Guests: Justin Haskins & Rep. Philip Singleton | 3/23/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Biden’s Supreme Court pick, who couldn’t define the word "woman." Glenn and Stu discuss the importance of truth and gender in our country. The Left is continuing its takeover of Disney. Glenn digs through the history of Biden’s Supreme Court pick and the extremist groups that have backed her. Co-author of “The Great Reset” Justin Haskins joins Glenn to discuss his Newsweek article, “Biden's Plan for a Digital Dollar Is a Massive Threat to Freedom.” Glenn discusses the current state of the Middle East and the dangers it can bring. Georgia Rep. Philip Singleton joins to discuss Georgia's Mental Health Parity Act and the dangers it brings. Glenn tells a heartbreaking story about Ukrainian orphans.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
